biotools.summary: Package for simulating genomic selection or GWAS data, that drops simulated haplotypes through a pedigree using MaCS. It can simulate sequence and SNP data, pedigrees, QTL effects, and breeding values. Pre-specified pedigrees can also be supplied.

bioschemas.name: AlphaDrop beta
bioschemas.summary: Package for simulating genomic selection or GWAS data, that drops simulated haplotypes through a pedigree using MaCS. It can simulate sequence and SNP data, pedigrees, QTL effects, and breeding values. Pre-specified pedigrees can also be supplied.
